item.title: Windowsでbunを試す
item.description: Bun — A fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime v1.1でWindowsにも対応したということなので、Surface go 2で試してみた。 $ bun create next-app √ What is your project named? ... bun-next-app √ Would you like to use TypeScript? ... No / Yes √ Would you like to use ESLint? ... No / Yes √ Would you like to use Tailwind CSS? ... No / Yes √ Would you like to use `src/` directory? ... No / Yes √ Would you like to use App Router? (recommended) ... No / Yes √ Would you like to customize the default import alias (@/*)? ... No / Yes √ What import alias would you like configured? ... @/* $ cd bun-next-app/ $
